title: Long Division - Step by Step
excerpt: The scariest algorithm in elementary school becomes simple when you know the order of operations.
author: Smart Worksheets Team
content:
DMSB - The Classic Memory Trick

Remember the steps: Divide, Multiply, Subtract, Bring down. Some use "Does McDonald's Serve Burgers?" as a mnemonic.

Repeat this mantra at every step of the exercise.
